department.en: International Master of Business Administration program
department.ch: 國際經營管理碩士學位學程

goal.en: 1. Basic understanding of Business Model 2. Criteria of good Business Model 3. Designing of Business Model
goal.ch: 成功修完本課程之同學應具備: 1. 商業模型學術理論的基本概念 2. 了解良好的商業模式應具備那些要素 3. 設計商業模型

content.en: This course talks about three different business models (RTVN, Lean canvas and OBMC) and how to create value through those models.
content.ch: 本課程中我們將探討三種不同的商業模型，以及如何透過這些商業模型來創造價值。

textbook.en: “Text: A.J.Bock and G.George. 2018. ““The Business Model Book: Design, Build and Adapt Business that Thrive““ Pearson: 1st ed. Recommended
textbook.ch: “Text: A.J.Bock and G.George. 2018. ““The Business Model Book: Design, Build and Adapt Business that Thrive““ Pearson: 1st ed. Recommended

flex_desc.en: Students are required to find and study cases related to the subject of this course.
flex_desc.ch: Students are required to find and study cases related to the subject of this course.

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
